title: Stress: A Personal Challenge (TEFC)
brief_description: This vide shows the way stress manifests itself mentally and physically, and presents some of the everyday gestures which may indicate stress. It highlights an individual, personal approach to dealing with stress; and how to control it and be turned to one’s advantage.
